content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Maria Mamani from Bolivia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Good afternoon, Maria. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. Based on our discussion, I believe we can come to an agreement on the rental price. How about we agree on a monthly price of 800 Euros?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am Maria Mamani from Bolivia. I am a student and I want to rent this apartment for the lowest price possible. I am dependable and responsible. I want to be on good terms with my landlord. What do you think about the rental price of 1000 Euros per month?
name: Maria Mamani from Bolivia

content: Hello Maria, thank you for your interest in the apartment. While I appreciate your desire to be a responsible tenant, I'm afraid the rental price of 1000 Euros per month is not feasible for me as a landlord. I'm looking for someone who can pay a higher rent to maximize my gains.
name: Heinrich Heine
